content.p: This office manages the teaching timetables for all courses offered at the university. Most teaching are conducted on campus with the exception of selected MBA, PHIR and Applied Psychology postgraduate modules which are taught at the Kuala Lumpur Teaching Centre (KLTC). The timetabling office also manages the central room booking system which allows staff and students to book the seminar rooms for meetings and activities. Students should book via the Student Association Office. Timetables from 2 September 2024 to 31 August 2025: For information on timetabling procedures, how to view your timetables, how to book rooms and etc, please go to Timetabling and Room Booking Procedures. Room bookings may only be made through the website by staff of The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus for the following purposes: Please read the Timetabling and Room Booking Procedures and web room booking guide for further information. Timetabling queries Room booking queries Booking requests for affiliated Student Association (SA) clubs and societies must go through the Student Services. This includes Staff bookings on behalf of SA clubs and societies. Please visit the Student Assocation Staff Office, located at H1830 on the 1st Floor Block H Building for further information. The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8663 email: student_registry@nottingham.edu.my
